page.title: 02CLUBS IN BALMEDIE
page.content: In Balmedie there are many different kinds of clubs. Children and adults can all go to clubs around this area.Some of the childrens clubs are Football, Saturday club, Brownies Volleyball, Badminton and Netball which are held ,at the community part of our school. There are 2 youth clubs in Balmedie. There is a bowling club on Friday nights and you can go if you are between 11 and 16. The only adult club there is, is the bowling club on a Tuesday. The only old folks clubs are senior citizens. This is held on a Tuesday after school.
